articles.title: Dollar dips on stimulus optimism, bets on Biden victory
articles.description: The dollar fell to three-week lows on Friday as optimism that a deal for new U.S. stimulus would be reached, and as investors bet that Democrat Joe Biden is more likely to win the U.S. presidency and offer a larger economic package.
